Predictor::StatePrediction

Predictor::StatePrediction Class Reference

Interface for reachable states that facilitates backups of the predicted return and predicted terminal-state distribution. More...

#include <predictor.hh>

Detailed Description

Interface for reachable states that facilitates backups of the predicted return and predicted terminal-state distribution.

Member Function Documentation

virtual void Predictor::StatePrediction::add_predecessor ( const StateWeakRef &  pred,
double  probability 
) [pure virtual]

Informs this StatePrediction to backup reward and transition distribution changes to the given predecessor, weighted by the given probability.

Note that this method is used to update the probability for an existing predecessor.

Parameters:
pred A State that can transition to this StatePrediction
probability The probability with which pred transitions to this StatePrediction

Implemented in Predictor::TerminalStatePrediction, and Predictor::State.

virtual double Predictor::StatePrediction::predict_return ( double  p  )  const [pure virtual]

Parameters:
p A probability
Returns:
The predicted return from this state, weighted by the given probability

Implemented in Predictor::TerminalStatePrediction, and Predictor::State.

virtual void Predictor::StatePrediction::predict_terminals ( EffectDistribution &  term,
double  p 
) const [pure virtual]

Parameters:
term An effect distribution that accumulates a predicted distribution over terminal states. This method will add the predicted terminal states for this StatePrediction, weighted by the given probability p, to the existing predicted terminal states (from other StatePrediction objects).
p A probability

Implemented in Predictor::TerminalStatePrediction, and Predictor::State.

virtual void Predictor::StatePrediction::remove_predecessor ( const StateWeakRef &  pred  )  [pure virtual]

Informs this StatePrediction to cease backing up reward and transition distribution changes to a certain predecessor State.

Parameters:
pred A State that no longer transitions to this StatePrediction

Implemented in Predictor::TerminalStatePrediction, and Predictor::State.
